name: Crabi, Inc.
description: Developer of an automobile insurance platform designed to offer a new way of insurance that focuses on the person and not the car. The company's platform delivers simple, easy, and accessible personalized car insurance, a human-centered design to create a better digital experience around buying, managing, and making claims on a policy, enabling customers to get insured wherever they are, whenever they want, and pay what they need.
one_liner: Developer of an automobile insurance platform designed to offer a new way of insurance that focuses on the person and not the car. The company's platform delivers simple, easy, and accessible personalized car insurance, a human-centered design to create a better digital experience around buying, managing, and making claims on a policy, enabling customers to get insured wherever they are, whenever they want, and pay what they need.
